name: Pony Head
info:
• 简体中文名: 小马头
  • 别名: 飛天小馬頭公主
  • 别名: Flying Princess Pony Head
  • 别名: ポニー・ヘッド
  • 性别: 女
detail: Star’s sassy, sarcastic, mischief-making, magical flying best friend from Mewni. She’s jealous of Marco’s friendship with Star and makes fun of him, and Marco is not a huge fan of her either. But Star ultimately is able to bring them together.
